Random Geekery

All Pages Posts Now

Go

Summary

Google’s Programming Language for developing services

Jots

Wherever Go project executable files go, make sure it’s on your path.

export PATH="$HOME/go/bin:$PATH"

Workflow

 
mkdir hello
cd hello
go mod init example/user/hello

Run it while you’re working

go run .

when your code is ready enough, install it

go install .

Add dependencies

go get github.com/golobby/dotenv

Development tools for Go

gopls

official Go LSP server

tools/gopls at master · golang/tools · GitHub

golangci-lint

“linters aggregator” for Go

go install github.com/golangci/golangci-lint/cmd/golangci-lint@latest

Configuration

{{renderer :linkpreview,https://golangci-lint.run/usage/configuration/}}

YAML, TOM, and JSON supported for configuration. Put one of these in your project directory.

.golangci.yml

.golangci.yaml

.golangci.toml

.golangci.json

Golden config for golangci-lint · GitHub

Introduction | golangci-lint

cgo

A FFI framework for Go.

Go for Visual Studio Code

For writing Go in VS Code

Use it with golangci-lint

    "go.lintTool": "golangci-lint",
    "go.lintFlags": [
        "--fast"
    ],

caption:: settings.json

Go - Visual Studio Marketplace

Testing tools for Go

Testify

Testing extensions that integrate smoothly with the standard testing library.

testify package - github.com/stretchr/testify - Go Packages

GitHub - stretchr/testify

GoFakeIt

Fake data generator so you can stop using name := "Example Name"

GitHub - brianvoe/gofakeit: Random fake data generator written in go

Generating fake Data for Testing in Go with GoFakeIt | by Sidharthan Chandrasekaran Kamaraj | The Bug Shots | Medium
